translations: n．抗议，反对：表示强烈反对或抗议的行为或言辞。
· Despite the remonstrances of his friends, he decided to quit his job.
尽管朋友们反对，他还是决定辞职。

sentences.sentence: Brigida at last accepted the gift after a great many remonstrances.
sentences.translation: 布丽吉特几经规劝，终于接受了这份礼物。

sentences.sentence: Mr. archibald did not give himself the trouble of making many remonstrances.
sentences.translation: 阿奇博尔德先生似乎不想自找麻烦多方规劝。
